metadata.Title: CVE-2018-25008 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In the standard library in Rust before 1.29.0, there is weaksynchronization in the Arc::get_mut method. This synchronization issue canbe lead to memory safety issues through race conditions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-25008` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libstd-rust-1.47 - 1.47.0+dfsg1+llvm-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
rust-gdb - 1.47.0+dfsg1+llvm-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
rust-lldb - 1.47.0+dfsg1+llvm-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
rust-src - 1.47.0+dfsg1+llvm-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
rustc - 1.47.0+dfsg1+llvm-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rustc package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.47.0+dfsg1+llvm-1ubuntu1~18.04.1').
